code: var getDataFromApi=function getDataFromApi(){return fetch('https://rickandmortyapi.com/api/character').then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(charactersData){var characters=charactersData.results.map(function(character){return{name:character.name,species:character.species,image:character.image,id:character.id,status:character.status,gender:character.gender,origin:character.origin.name,episode:character.epsisode};});console.log(characters);return characters;});};export default getDataFromApi;
